page.title: 06BURTON JOYCE-HOME LIFE
page.content: {Dean Walker -}On Sunday I woke up and started to read the Angler's Times and the Fisherman's Handbook.I had to clean out my 12 budgies.They haven't laid any eggs yet, but they are going in the nest boxes.I went fishing in the River Trent and I caught perch, chub and gudgeon. {Becky Ellis -}On Saturday morning I went swimming with my aunt at Rushcliffe.In the evening we went roller skating.On Sunday,my friend Victoria and I went horse riding with my sister Claire.We got chased by bulls. {Michael Williamson -}On Sunday,Richard and I went to a Young Ornithologists meeting at Attenborough.We were split into two groups to go pond dipping. We got lots of little insects.Then we went bird watching. We saw grebes, herons,cormorants and terns.
